common.title: Paper Map for printable map information

map.desc_1: Map information collected by a variety of people.
map.desc_2: When you adjust map to the areas that you need it,
map.desc_3: Map information optimized for printing will be displayed.
map.desc_4: Choose the right information for the right moment.
map.desc_5: It will fit on the printing paper just fine.
map.desc_6: Print it out and send it to people who need the information.
